name: Huntress
description:
Hey Everyone! We're Virtual Dwellers, and this is our first big project: Huntress!

We started developing Huntress for a class project, and we are sharing with all of you the result of 5 months of hard work!

This is our first original title!

This is a  Demo and depending on the support we recive we'll plan on making a full game!

If you want to see the development, you can check out in our Website: virtualdwellers.com
